Topic.Title: How to create a northwestern exit from a script, and have the NW command still work

Posts.EditableText:
```C++
create exit ("northwest", fromRoom, toRoom, "northwestdirection")
```

This way, all the commands that would normally take the player northwest will work.

This information may be posted somewhere, but I searched for an hour and couldn't find it.
